Mollusks

Diving and Divers
Fishing, Sport
Endangered and Extinct Species
organizations: California Department of Fish and Wildlife
lead_paragraph: A number of divers die each year in the pursuit of abalone, coveted for its shell and meat, while the California Department of Fish and Wildlife does its best to protect the species from illegal activity.
snippet: A number of divers die each year in the pursuit of abalone, coveted for its shell and meat, while the California Department of Fish and Wildlife does its best to protect the species from illegal activity.
